meet.label: Meet Elio
meet.title: AI-powered deal assistant for real estate teams.
meet.desc: Connects to WhatsApp conversations in real deals. Shows where money is being made, delayed, or lost.

dealVisibility.label: Deal visibility
dealVisibility.title: See every deal. Know who moves next.
dealVisibility.desc: Lead score, deal stage, deal health, and last action. All in one view.

quality.label: Quality control
quality.title: Track SLAs. Catch problems early.
quality.desc: First response time, follow-up speed, missed conversations, and script compliance.

actions.label: Smart actions
actions.title: Know exactly what to do next.
actions.desc: Priority queue, escalation flags, and weekly action plans for every deal.

reality.label: Reality check
reality.title: Can you answer these three questions right now?
reality.subtitle: If even one is a guess, you're losing money right now.
questions: How many deals is your team losing right now because no one followed up?
Which of your agents has unanswered clients in WhatsApp right now?
A buyer went quiet two days ago. Do you even know about it?
reality.footer: Elio gives you these answers automatically. From the conversations already happening.

dubai.label: Why this matters in Dubai
dubai.title: In Dubai real estate, speed decides outcomes.
dubai.desc: Elio shows where deals slow down. While there is still time to fix them.

cards.title: Buyers move quickly
cards.desc: International investors compare 5–10 options at once. First clear response wins.

cards.title: Silence kills deals
cards.desc: 48 hours without a reply and buyer interest drops by half.

cards.title: Late follow-ups cost revenue
cards.desc: By the time you notice a stalled deal, the commission is already lost.

builtFor.label: Built for Dubai
builtFor.title: Works with the tools your agency already uses
builtFor.desc: Portals, WhatsApp, and local CRM systems. Elio connects to all of them.

security.label: Security & privacy
security.title: Your conversations stay yours.
security.desc: Deal data is the most sensitive asset in your agency. We built Elio with that in mind from day one.

cards.title: End-to-end encryption
cards.desc: All data encrypted in transit and at rest. Your conversations never pass through unprotected channels.

cards.title: Your data, your control
cards.desc: No data shared with third parties. You decide who on your team sees what. Full access control per role.

cards.title: Data retention policy
cards.desc: Conversation data is processed in real-time and only insights are stored. Raw messages are not retained beyond analysis.

cards.title: UAE compliance
cards.desc: Hosted in the UAE region. Compliant with local data protection regulations and DIFC privacy standards.

pilot.label: Pilot
pilot.title: 30 days. Full picture of your deals.
pilot.desc: We connect to your team's WhatsApp conversations and deliver a working deal intelligence layer. Not a demo, not a report.

footer.tagline: AI-powered deal assistant for real estate teams. Built for Dubai.
footer.rights: Elio Technologies LLC. All rights reserved.

insights: Deals stall after viewings — 4 of 8 attention items are post-viewing
Follow-ups after pricing take the longest to resolve
Most attention items wait on agency action, not client

metadata.title: elio. — turn WhatsApp chats into closed deals
metadata.description: Turn WhatsApp conversations with buyers and investors into closed contracts. Full owner-level visibility over deal flow and agent performance.
